biotools.summary: scAdapt is a virtual adversarial domain adaptation network to transfer single cell labels between datasets with batch effects. scAdapt used both the labeled source and unlabeled target data to train an enhanced classifier, and aligned the labeled source centroid and pseudo-labeled target centroid to generate a joint embedding.

bioschemas.name: scAdapt
